#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int a[52][52];

int count(int low, int high, char str[])
{
	if(low>high)
	 return 0;
	 
	if(low==high)
	 return 1;
	
	if(a[low][high]!=-1)
	 return a[low][high];
	else{
	a[low+1][high] = count(low+1,high,str);
	a[low][high-1]= count(low,high-1,str);
	}
	int p = a[low+1][high] + a[low][high-1];
	
	if(str[low]!=str[high])
	 return  p- count(low+1,high-1,str);
	else
	 return p +1;
}

int main()
{
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--){
	char str[52];
	cin>>str;
	int len=strlen(str);
	for(int i=0;i<=51;i++)
	{
		for(int j=0;j<=51;j++)
		 a[i][j]=-1;
	}
	cout<<count(0,len-1,str)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
